casebody.data:
CITY OF HOBOKEN, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
PONTE EQUITIES, INC., Unity Environmental Corp., d/b/a Unity Educational Systems, Inc., Defendants-Petitioners,
and
Public Service Electric and Gas Company, Laz Parking New York/New Jersey, LLC and State of New Jersey, Defendants. C-911 September Term 2017
080917 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003822-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
